Title: Ventilator
Writer: Niren Bhatt (screenplay), Niren Bhatt, Karan Vyas, Karan Vyas (screenplay)
Actors: Jackie Shroff, Utkarsh Mazumdar, Pratik Gandhi, Sanjay Goradia
Plot: A son whose father is in serious condition and kept under ventilator during the period of Navratri festival creates a situation which can ruin the festival for other relatives.
